configuration.name: 热点模块统计
configuration.query: SELECT c_x,c_y,c_value,c_labelx,c_labely FROM (( SELECT 'm' c_x, d.c_name c_y, COUNT(0) c_value, '部署模块' c_labelx, d.c_name c_labely FROM t_project_module m INNER JOIN t_dict_module d ON d.c_id = m.c_module_id INNER JOIN t_customer c ON m.c_customer_id = c.c_id WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY d.c_id ) UNION ALL ( SELECT 'h' c_x, d.c_name c_y, COUNT(0) - 5, '热点模块', d.c_name c_module_name FROM t_project_module m INNER JOIN t_dict_module d ON d.c_id = m.c_module_id INNER JOIN t_customer c ON m.c_customer_id = c.c_id WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY d.c_id )) mm ORDER BY mm.c_x DESC, c_value DESC
